Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory192.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The hurried pace, the footprints without a care for direction, the beach decorations that the person must have ran into...'}
{3: 'These are all signs that the Construct under pursuit knows nothing about counter-tracking.'}
{3: 'For someone to run in so flustered a fashion, they must, at the very least, be worth chasing.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Take Gray Raven and go up ahead.', 3: '11'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Ready anytime. Strike Hawk will fully cooperate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Take Kamui and circle left.', 3: '17'}
{2: "I'll go right.", 3: '18'}
{3: 'The vital fluid footprints branch left and right curtly, but then eventually regroup. The regrouped trail tumbles toward the gate of the theme park in the distance.'}
{3: 'You do not find any signs of a battle, or rather, this person seems completely incapable of fighting.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Humanoid, male, Easterner-looking. He's stopped at the entrance of the theme park.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We're still just monitoring. Should we subdue the target now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As imagined.'}
{3: 'Looks like this Construct is not only completely oblivious to counter-tracking techniques, but is also heavily wounded.'}
{3: 'Before prying any information out of his mouth, he will at least require emergency repairs.'}
{2: 'Everyone, surround him.', 3: '35'}
{2: 'Everyone', 3: 'Roger!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory192.png'}
{3: 'The person being restrained by Lee is a man wearing a black trench coat.'}
{3: 'He is restrained, but only so Liv can perform emergency treatment on him.'}
{3: 'The Construct does not seem to be equipped with a functional Inver-Device. Even the frame design seems to be dated, harking back to the designs of Operation Acadia.'}
{3: '...Could this be Daedalus technology? But the Purifying Force is out on a mission right now, so it is impossible to confirm with Bianca.'}
{3: 'There is no response.'}
{3: 'Which is expected.'}
{3: 'Seems like external help might be required to identify this person.'}
{3: "Since this Construct's frame screams Operation Acadia period from up to down, someone in Babylonia might know his background."}
{3: 'It is still a crapshoot, but it should not hurt to ask.'}
{2: '(Connect to public channel)', 3: '53'}
{3: "...Someone might be able to help on Babylonia's public channel."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Oh? Aren't you folks on a vacation... Never mind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'A little help scanning a Construct, Asimov?', 3: '59'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What the—How did this frame withstand Corrupted attacks?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Doesn't seem like he can fight.", 3: '63'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You've piqued my curiosity. Is Liv doing emergency repairs on him?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'll need Liv's Inver-Device for a short while to run a more comprehensive scan... Aaand, got it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...It's the Ascension-Network.", 4: '1'}
{2: "He's an Ascendant?", 3: '68'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'That would have been a solid "yes" in the past, but after that Qu in Kowloong, I can\'t say for sure that he\'s the sort of Ascendant we know about.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'm going to need the speaker on your terminal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Heh. I know you're listening.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I've already found definite traces of Ascension-Network signals on you. But what is that hidden unknown function installed in your frame?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hidden function?', 3: '80'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Just kill me. The contents within will self-destruct when I die.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Then that "Miss Luna" will never get it.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "After all, you're all just expendable underlings like me, yes? I'm not saying a thing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This is related to that "Miss Luna"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The people in front of you are the task force of Babylonia, not sent by that "Miss Luna" you mentioned.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '【kuroname】, prove it.', 4: '2'}
{2: '(Show unique ID code)', 3: '88'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Why is Babylonia here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ahem, just happened to be here, really.', 3: '93'}
{3: 'The mysterious man eyes you strangely, then doubtfully surveys the Constructs around him.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You people have nothing to do with the Ascendants?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: '...If you are indeed unaffiliated with the Ascendants, then perhaps...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right at that moment, a black figure plummets from above your heads and lands, kicking up a cloud of dust.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia grabs the handle on the back of your exoskeleton armor, then activates the jetpack behind her to carry you out of the billowing dust.'}
{3: 'The others scatter as the dust clears, and the figure in the center of the dust cloud reveals himself.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{3: 'It is a familiar face—Roland, the Ascendant. He lands between you and the mysterious man, who took the blunt of the impact and is knocked down onto the gravel once again.'}
{3: 'Roland lifts the man handily, then flings him to two Corrupted who followed his landing. They immediately pin the man to the ground.'}
{3: 'Then he turns. He surveys your group on the beach with his usual bemused expression.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Hola amigos.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Nothing makes me happier than seeing you all alive and kicking.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "After all, t'would be a shame if you died before I got to destroy you one by one... Wouldn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Indeed. It's a me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Why are you the one surprised? Try being me, seeing you here for some reason.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What are you doing here?', 3: '117'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Ah-ah-ah. No, no, that's not how it goes. No explanations for you. Because we, the Ascendants, are the masters, the host, here today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "And the master need not explain to the guest their presence. 'Tis the other way round, the guests are the ones to explain their reason of visit.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Cut the crap. Now that you're here, you're never getting away.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Oh, you animal! Bad! What a bad houseguest you make!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'How fortunate you are though—I just have a thing for bad guests.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "So. Let's play a game.", 4: '1'}
